content:
TITLE: Registering Custom Block Style with JavaScript in WordPress DESCRIPTION: This JavaScript code in block-styles.js registers the 'Hand Drawn' block style for the Image block. It uses the wp.blocks.registerBlockStyle function to add the new style variation. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-block-style-js/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` wp.domReady( function () { wp.blocks.registerBlockStyle( 'core/image', { name: 'hand-drawn', label: 'Hand Drawn', } ); } ); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enqueuing Scripts and Styles for Custom Block Styles in WordPress DESCRIPTION: This PHP code in functions.php enqueues the necessary JavaScript and CSS files for the custom block style. It ensures the files are loaded only in the block editor context. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-block-style-js/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: php CODE: ``` get( 'Version' ), true ); } add_action( 'enqueue_block_editor_assets', 'enqueue_block_variation_script' ); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Registering Custom Template Part Area in WordPress (PHP) DESCRIPTION: This code snippet registers a custom template part area named 'Sidebar' using the 'after_setup_theme' hook in WordPress. It demonstrates how to extend the default template part areas in a block theme. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-template-part-area/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` add_action( 'after_setup_theme', function() { add_filter( 'default_wp_template_part_areas', function( $areas ) { $areas[] = array( 'area' => 'sidebar', 'area_tag' => 'sidebar', 'label' => __( 'Sidebar', 'example-template-part-area' ), 'description' => __( 'The Sidebar template defines a page area that typically contains a list of widgets.', 'example-template-part-area' ), 'icon' => 'sidebar', ); return $areas; } ); } ); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Assigning Custom Template Part Area in theme.json (JSON) DESCRIPTION: This JSON configuration in theme.json assigns the 'parts/sidebar.html' template part to the custom 'sidebar' area. It demonstrates how to integrate the custom template part area into the theme's structure. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-template-part-area/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: JSON CODE: ``` { "version": 2, "templateParts": [ { "name": "sidebar", "area": "sidebar" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Sidebar Template Part in WordPress (HTML) DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet represents the content of the 'parts/sidebar.html' file, which defines the structure and content of the sidebar template part. It typically contains widgets or other sidebar-specific content. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-template-part-area/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

Archives

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enqueuing CSS and JavaScript in WordPress Child Theme DESCRIPTION: This PHP snippet from functions.php demonstrates how to enqueue custom CSS and JavaScript files for both the editor and front-end in a WordPress child theme. It uses wp_enqueue_script() and wp_enqueue_style() functions. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-build-process/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: php CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining npm Scripts for WordPress Theme Development DESCRIPTION: This package.json snippet defines two main npm scripts for WordPress theme development: 'start' for development watching and building, and 'build' for production builds. It utilizes @wordpress/scripts package. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-build-process/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` "scripts": { "start": "wp-scripts start", "build": "wp-scripts build" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Registering Locked Block Pattern in WordPress DESCRIPTION: File custom-event.php demonstrates registering a custom block pattern with templateLock set to 'contentOnly' to restrict editing capabilities. This pattern is designed as part of a child theme extending Twenty Twenty-Four theme functionality. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-locked-pattern/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: php CODE: ``` "contentOnly"] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Registering Custom Block Pattern in PHP for WordPress DESCRIPTION: This code snippet, located in 'patterns/event-announcement.php', registers a custom block pattern named 'Event Announcement'. It's designed to appear as starter content when creating a new post in the WordPress block editor. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/twentytwentyfour-starter-content-patterns/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ```

Greetings! We are thrilled to announce our upcoming event, which promises to be an unforgettable experience for all attendees. Mark your calendars and get ready for an exciting day filled with inspiration, learning, and networking opportunities.

Event Details:

  • Date: [Insert Date]
  • Time: [Insert Time]
  • Location: [Insert Venue]
  • Theme: [Insert Event Theme]

Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to [brief description of event benefits]. Register now to secure your spot!

Register Now
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Registering Custom Archive Template Pattern in WordPress DESCRIPTION: This file registers a custom block pattern named 'Archive Template' that appears when creating archive-type templates in the WordPress Site Editor. It serves as a starter template pattern specifically for archive, author, category, date, tag, and taxonomy templates. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/twentytwentyfour-starter-template-patterns/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` patterns/template-archive.php ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: WordPress Child Theme Structure for Block Stylesheets DESCRIPTION: Project structure showing the required files for implementing custom block stylesheets in a WordPress child theme. The implementation requires functions.php for registration and a CSS file for styling the Image block. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-block-stylesheet/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` - functions.php - assets/css/blocks/core-image.css ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a GPL License Header for Source Files DESCRIPTION: A template for the standard GPL license header that should be placed at the beginning of source files to indicate licensing terms and lack of warranty. This includes copyright notice, license terms, and distribution permissions. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-block-variation/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` one line to give the program's name and an idea of what it does. Copyright (C) yyyy name of author This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Copyright Header for Source Files in GNU GPL Projects DESCRIPTION: A template for the standard copyright header that should be placed at the beginning of each source file in a GNU GPL licensed project. It includes the program description, copyright notice, and license declaration. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-block-style-php/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` one line to give the program's name and an idea of what it does. Copyright (C) yyyy name of author This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic GPL License Header Template for Source Files DESCRIPTION: A template for the standard GPL license header that should be included at the beginning of each source file. Contains placeholders for program name, description, copyright year and author name. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-build-process/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` one line to give the program's name and an idea of what it does. Copyright (C) yyyy name of author This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Applying GPL License Notice to Source Files DESCRIPTION: A template for the license notice to be included at the start of each source file in a GPL-licensed project. It includes placeholders for the program name, copyright year, and author name. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-locked-pattern/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` one line to give the program's name and an idea of what it does. Copyright (C) yyyy name of author This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: GPL License Notice Template for Source Files DESCRIPTION: A template for the copyright and license notice that should be attached to the start of each source file in a GPL-licensed program. This notice conveys basic copyright information and the exclusion of warranty. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-block-style-js/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` one line to give the program's name and an idea of what it does. Copyright (C) yyyy name of author This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: GPL License Header Template for Source Files DESCRIPTION: A template for the license header that should be added to the start of each source file. It includes a program description, copyright notice, and the terms of the GNU General Public License. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/twentytwentyfour-starter-template-patterns/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` one line to give the program's name and an idea of what it does. Copyright (C) yyyy name of author This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sample Copyright Notice for GPL-Licensed Programs DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to attach copyright and license notices to a program licensed under the GNU General Public License. It includes placeholders for the program name, copyright year, and author name. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/twentytwentyfour-starter-content-patterns/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` one line to give the program's name and an idea of what it does. Copyright (C) yyyy name of author This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic GPL Source File Notice Template DESCRIPTION: Template for the standard GPL notice that should be included at the start of source code files, including copyright notice and warranty disclaimer. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-template-part-area/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` one line to give the program's name and an idea of what it does. Copyright (C) yyyy name of author This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sample Copyright Notice for GNU GPL DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to add a copyright notice and GNU GPL terms to a program. It includes placeholders for the program name, copyright year, and author name. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-block-stylesheet/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` one line to give the program's name and an idea of what it does. Copyright (C) yyyy name of author This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Interactive Program GPL Notice Example DESCRIPTION: A sample output notice for interactive programs that informs users about the lack of warranty and the ability to view GPL license details through specific commands. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-block-variation/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Gnomovision version 69, Copyright (C) year name of author Gnomovision comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY; for details type `show w'. This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions; type `show c' for details. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Interactive Program License Notice for GNU GPL Projects DESCRIPTION: A template for the license notice that should be displayed when an interactive program starts. It provides a basic copyright statement and instructions for viewing warranty and redistribution details. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-block-style-php/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Gnomovision version 69, Copyright (C) year name of author Gnomovision comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY; for details type `show w'. This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions; type `show c' for details. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Interactive Program License Notice Example DESCRIPTION: An example of how to display a short GPL notice when an interactive program starts. Shows proper copyright formatting and mentions commands to view warranty and redistribution details. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-build-process/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Gnomovision version 69, Copyright (C) year name of author Gnomovision comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY; for details type `show w'. This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions; type `show c' for details. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Interactive Program GPL Notice Example DESCRIPTION: An example of a short GPL notice to be displayed when an interactive program starts. It includes the program name, version, copyright information, and instructions for viewing warranty and redistribution details. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-locked-pattern/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Gnomovision version 69, Copyright (C) year name of author Gnomovision comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY; for details type `show w'. This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions; type `show c' for details. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Interactive Program Notice Example for GPL DESCRIPTION: A template for the short notice that should be displayed when an interactive GPL-licensed program starts. This provides users with basic copyright information and instructions for viewing warranty and redistribution details. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-block-style-js/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Gnomovision version 69, Copyright (C) year name of author Gnomovision comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY; for details type `show w'. This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions; type `show c' for details. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Interactive Program License Notice Template DESCRIPTION: A template for displaying a short license notice when an interactive program starts. It includes copyright information and instructions for viewing warranty and redistribution details. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/twentytwentyfour-starter-template-patterns/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Gnomovision version 69, Copyright (C) year name of author Gnomovision comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY; for details type `show w'. This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions; type `show c' for details. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Interactive Program Copyright Notice for GPL-Licensed Software DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows an example of a short copyright notice to be displayed when an interactive program starts. It includes placeholders for the program name, version, copyright year, and author name. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/twentytwentyfour-starter-content-patterns/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Gnomovision version 69, Copyright (C) year name of author Gnomovision comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY; for details type `show w'. This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions; type `show c' for details. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Interactive Program Notice Template DESCRIPTION: Example of a short notice to display when an interactive program starts, informing users about warranty and redistribution terms. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-template-part-area/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` Gnomovision version 69, Copyright (C) year name of author Gnomovision comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY; for details type `show w'. This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions; type `show c' for details. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Interactive Program Notice for GNU GPL DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows a sample notice to be displayed when an interactive program starts. It includes the program name, version, copyright information, and mentions the absence of warranty. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-block-stylesheet/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Gnomovision version 69, Copyright (C) year name of author Gnomovision comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY; for details type `show w'. This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions; type `show c' for details. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Copyright Disclaimer Template for Organizations DESCRIPTION: A sample copyright disclaimer template that can be used by employers or organizations to disclaim copyright interest in a GPL-licensed program created by an employee. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-block-variation/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Yoyodyne, Inc., hereby disclaims all copyright interest in the program `Gnomovision' (which makes passes at compilers) written by James Hacker. signature of Ty Coon, 1 April 1989 Ty Coon, President of Vice ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Copyright Disclaimer Template for GNU GPL Projects DESCRIPTION: A template for a copyright disclaimer that can be used when an employer or institution needs to disclaim copyright interest in a program. It provides a formal statement of copyright release. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-block-style-php/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Yoyodyne, Inc., hereby disclaims all copyright interest in the program `Gnomovision' (which makes passes at compilers) written by James Hacker. signature of Ty Coon, 1 April 1989 Ty Coon, President of Vice ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Copyright Disclaimer Template for Employers DESCRIPTION: A sample template for a copyright disclaimer that employers can use to formally disclaim copyright interest in a program written by their employees. Includes placeholders for company, program name, and author. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-build-process/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Yoyodyne, Inc., hereby disclaims all copyright interest in the program `Gnomovision' (which makes passes at compilers) written by James Hacker. signature of Ty Coon, 1 April 1989 Ty Coon, President of Vice ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Copyright Disclaimer Template for GPL Projects DESCRIPTION: A sample copyright disclaimer to be signed by an employer or institution, disclaiming copyright interest in a GPL-licensed program. This template can be modified with specific program and individual names. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-locked-pattern/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Yoyodyne, Inc., hereby disclaims all copyright interest in the program `Gnomovision' (which makes passes at compilers) written by James Hacker. signature of Ty Coon, 1 April 1989 Ty Coon, President of Vice ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Copyright Disclaimer Template for GPL Projects DESCRIPTION: A sample copyright disclaimer template that can be used by employers or institutions to disclaim copyright interest in a GPL-licensed program created by their employees or students. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-block-style-js/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Yoyodyne, Inc., hereby disclaims all copyright interest in the program `Gnomovision' (which makes passes at compilers) written by James Hacker. signature of Ty Coon, 1 April 1989 Ty Coon, President of Vice ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Copyright Disclaimer Template for Organizations DESCRIPTION: A sample copyright disclaimer template for employers or organizations to disclaim copyright interest in a program written by an employee or member. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/twentytwentyfour-starter-template-patterns/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Yoyodyne, Inc., hereby disclaims all copyright interest in the program `Gnomovision' (which makes passes at compilers) written by James Hacker. signature of Ty Coon, 1 April 1989 Ty Coon, President of Vice ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sample Copyright Disclaimer for GPL-Licensed Programs DESCRIPTION: This snippet provides an example of a copyright disclaimer that can be signed by an employer or school to disclaim copyright interest in a GPL-licensed program. It includes placeholders for company name, program name, and author name. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/twentytwentyfour-starter-content-patterns/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Yoyodyne, Inc., hereby disclaims all copyright interest in the program `Gnomovision' (which makes passes at compilers) written by James Hacker. signature of Ty Coon, 1 April 1989 Ty Coon, President of Vice ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Copyright Disclaimer Template DESCRIPTION: Sample template for a copyright disclaimer that can be used by employers or organizations to disclaim copyright interest in GPL-licensed software. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-template-part-area/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` Yoyodyne, Inc., hereby disclaims all copyright interest in the program `Gnomovision' (which makes passes at compilers) written by James Hacker. signature of Ty Coon, 1 April 1989 Ty Coon, President of Vice ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sample Copyright Disclaimer for GNU GPL DESCRIPTION: This snippet provides a template for a copyright disclaimer that can be used by employers or schools to disclaim copyright interest in a program licensed under GNU GPL. SOURCE: https://github.com/wordpress/block-theme-examples/blob/master/example-block-stylesheet/LICENSE.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Yoyodyne, Inc., hereby disclaims all copyright interest in the program `Gnomovision' (which makes passes at compilers) written by James Hacker. signature of Ty Coon, 1 April 1989 Ty Coon, President of Vice ```
